rules:
    paths-characters:
        description: Path should contain only recommended characters.
        message: Path contains non-recommended characters.
        severity: hint
        formats:
            :
            :
        given: $.paths.*~
        then:
            function: pattern
            functionOptions:
                match: ^(/([0-9A-Za-z._~-]+|{[^}]+}))*(/([0-9A-Za-z._~:-]+|{[^}]*}(:[0-9A-Za-z._~-]+)?))$
